result.markdown: --- title: "Geog 510: GIS and Spatial Analysis for Public Health" date: 'Updated: `r format(Sys.Date(), "%B %d, %Y")`' output: html_document: theme: flatly toc: yes toc_float: yes toc_depth: 3 --- ```{css, echo=FALSE} a { color: royalblue; } a:hover { color: darkorange; } ``` ------ ### Instructor Information **Instructor:** Dr. Varun Goel **Office:** Callcott 111 **Appointment link:** [Click Here](https://outlook.office.com/bookwithme/user/675339bb37584ebaa37d12437cb4f286@sc.edu/meetingtype/aKkUKwRTska6ndT42c8OWg2?anonymous&ep=mlink) **Email:** varungoel@sc.edu ------ **Instructor:** Varun Goel **Location:** ### Course Essentials **Meeting times:** Monday, Wednesday *2:20 pm - 3:35pm* **Meeting location:** Callcott 302 **Student Support Hours:** Mon 11am - 12pm, Thu 2 - 4pm, Fri 2 - 3pm **Appointment link:** [Click Here](https://outlook.office.com/bookwithme/user/675339bb37584ebaa37d12437cb4f286@sc.edu/meetingtype/aKkUKwRTska6ndT42c8OWg2?anonymous&ep=mlink) ------ ### Required Text Cromley, E. K., & McLaferty, S. L. (2012). GIS and Public Health (2nd edition). New York: Guilford Press. [**This is available for free via the USC Library!**](https://catalog.lib.unc.edu/catalog/UNCb7325669) I will also post .pdfs of the chapters on blackboard. Additional readings will be posted on blackboard or available online. See the Readings document for a list of all course readings. ------ ### Updated Syllabus The latest class syllabus can downloaded [here](./Geog510_GISandHealth_SP25_011225.docx) ------
